### emitDarwinBCHeaderAndTrailer() {#a8ea1d38f4a65135188eb7409818070e6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void emitDarwinBCHeaderAndTrailer (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; char &gt; &amp; Buffer, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/triple">Triple</a> &amp; TT)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
If generating a bc file on darwin, we have to emit a header and trailer to make it compatible with the system archiver.

To do this we emit the following header, and then emit a trailer that pads the file out to be a multiple of 16 bytes.

struct bc&#95;header &#123; uint32&#95;t Magic; // 0x0B17C0DE uint32&#95;t Version; // Version, currently always 0. uint32&#95;t BitcodeOffset; // Offset to traditional bitcode file. uint32&#95;t BitcodeSize; // Size of traditional bitcode file. uint32&#95;t CPUType; // CPU specifier. ... potentially more later ... &#125;;

Definition at line <a href="#l05209">5209</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/bitcode/lib/bitcode/writer/bitcodewriter-cpp">BitcodeWriter.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// declarations or definitions in the module). If so, synthesize a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// value id.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal">          for (auto &amp;RefEdge : FS-&gt;refs())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal">            if (!RefEdge.haveGVs() || !RefEdge.getValue())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">              assignValueId(RefEdge.getGUID());</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2222"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Abbrev) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2223"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In order to support all possible bitcode formats in BitcodeReader we need</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2224"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to distinguish the following cases:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2225"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1) Record has no artificial tag (Record&#91;1&#93;),</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2226"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   has no obsolete inlinedAt field (Record&#91;9&#93;).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2227"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   In this case Record size will be 8, HasAlignment flag is false.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2228"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 2) Record has artificial tag (Record&#91;1&#93;),</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2229"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   has no obsolete inlignedAt field (Record&#91;9&#93;).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2230"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   In this case Record size will be 9, HasAlignment flag is false.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2231"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 3) Record has both artificial tag (Record&#91;1&#93;) and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2232"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   obsolete inlignedAt field (Record&#91;9&#93;).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2233"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   In this case Record size will be 10, HasAlignment flag is false.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2234"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 4) Record has neither artificial tag, nor inlignedAt field, but</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2235"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   HasAlignment flag is true and Record&#91;8&#93; contains alignment value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2236"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t HasAlignmentFlag = 1 &lt;&lt; 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2237"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/record">Record</a>.push&#95;back((uint64&#95;t)<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;isDistinct() | HasAlignmentFlag);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2463"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IndexAbbrev = Stream.EmitAbbrev(std::move(Abbv));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2464"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2465"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Emit MDStrings together upfront.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2466"><Highlight kind="normal">  writeMetadataStrings(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ve">VE</a>.getMDStrings(), <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/record">Record</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2467"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2468"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We only emit an index for the metadata record if we have more than a given</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2469"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (naive) threshold of metadatas, otherwise it is not worth it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2470"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ve">VE</a>.getNonMDStrings().size() &gt; <a href="#ab937b5cbd57983fceac42c85eb831711">IndexThreshold</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2471"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Write a placeholder value in for the offset of the metadata index,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2472"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// which is written after the records, so that it can include</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2473"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the offset of each entry. The placeholder offset will be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2474"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// updated after all records are emitted.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2475"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t Vals&#91;&#93; = &#123;0, 0&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2476"><Highlight kind="normal">    Stream.EmitRecord(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/bitc/#a1439ec3246fdaf3a3b4fb4f4e2683c5ca39ce80fab8b00b665cfcc0effac8cb2b">bitc::METADATA&#95;INDEX&#95;OFFSET</a>, Vals, OffsetAbbrev);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2477"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2478"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2479"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute and save the bit offset to the current position, which will be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2480"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// patched when we emit the index later. We can simply subtract the 64-bit</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2481"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// fixed size from the current bit number to get the location to backpatch.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2482"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t IndexOffsetRecordBitPos = Stream.GetCurrentBitNo();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2483"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2484"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This index will contain the bitpos for each individual record.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2485"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; IndexPos;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2486"><Highlight kind="normal">  IndexPos.reserve(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ve">VE</a>.getNonMDStrings().size());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2487"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2488"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Write all the records</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2489"><Highlight kind="normal">  writeMetadataRecords(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ve">VE</a>.getNonMDStrings(), <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/record">Record</a>, &amp;MDAbbrevs, &amp;IndexPos);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2490"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2491"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ve">VE</a>.getNonMDStrings().size() &gt; <a href="#ab937b5cbd57983fceac42c85eb831711">IndexThreshold</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2492"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now that we have emitted all the records we will emit the index. But</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2493"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// first</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2494"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// backpatch the forward reference so that the reader can skip the records</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2495"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// efficiently.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2496"><Highlight kind="normal">    Stream.BackpatchWord64(IndexOffsetRecordBitPos - 64,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2497"><Highlight kind="normal">                           Stream.GetCurrentBitNo() - IndexOffsetRecordBitPos);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2498"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2499"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Delta encode the index.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2500"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t PreviousValue = IndexOffsetRecordBitPos;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2501"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Elt : IndexPos) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2502"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EltDelta = Elt - PreviousValue;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2503"><Highlight kind="normal">      PreviousValue = Elt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2504"><Highlight kind="normal">      Elt = EltDelta;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2505"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2506"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Emit the index record.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2507"><Highlight kind="normal">    Stream.EmitRecord(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/bitc/#a1439ec3246fdaf3a3b4fb4f4e2683c5ca380f5b65b785ef2784b256f57b117d54">bitc::METADATA&#95;INDEX</a>, IndexPos, IndexAbbrev);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2508"><Highlight kind="normal">    IndexPos.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2935"><Highlight kind="comment">/// pushValueAndType - The file has to encode both the value and type id for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2936"><Highlight kind="comment">/// many values, because we need to know what type to create for forward</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2940"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This function adds V&#39;s value ID to Vals.  If the value ID is higher than the</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l05196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5196"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If generating a bc file on darwin, we have to emit a</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l05198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5198"><Highlight kind="comment">/// this we emit the following header, and then emit a trailer that pads the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l05199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5199"><Highlight kind="comment">/// file out to be a multiple of 16 bytes.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l05200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5200"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l05201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5201"><Highlight kind="comment">/// struct bc&#95;header &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l05202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5202"><Highlight kind="comment">///   uint32&#95;t Magic;         // 186106078</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l05204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5204"><Highlight kind="comment">///   uint32&#95;t BitcodeOffset; // Offset to traditional bitcode file.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l05205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5205"><Highlight kind="comment">///   uint32&#95;t BitcodeSize;   // Size of traditional bitcode file.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l05206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5206"><Highlight kind="comment">///   uint32&#95;t CPUType;       // CPU specifier.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l05207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5207"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ... potentially more later ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l05208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5208"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#125;;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l05209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5209" lineLink="#a8ea1d38f4a65135188eb7409818070e6"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a8ea1d38f4a65135188eb7409818070e6">emitDarwinBCHeaderAndTrailer</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;char&gt;</a> &amp;Buffer,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l05210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5210"><Highlight kind="normal">                                         </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/triple">Triple</a> &amp;TT) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l05214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5214"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// armv&#91;0-9&#93;-&#42;, thumbv&#91;0-9&#93;-&#42;, armv5te-&#42;, or armv6t2-&#42;. The CPUType is a magic</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l05215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5215"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// number from /usr/include/mach/machine.h.  It is ok to reproduce the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
